lyrics:
8 contributorsdodge the hate lyricschorus

hopped on the interstate

you might also likechorus
im goin outer space
in love with the dead face
im steady gainin weight
im just tryna dodge the hate
my futures bright as day
they throwin all kind of shade

verse 2
